Step 1: PREP: Dice the tomato, chop the red pepper, onion, and turkey sausage.
Step 2: In a large pan, drizzle onions and peppers with olive oil and saute.
Step 3: When the onions are clear and peppers are tender, season with salt and pepper.
Step 4: Add chopped turkey sausage, and saute until sausage is golden brown.
Step 5: Lower heat, add egg whites, and scramble.
Step 6: When eggs are almost done, add in tomato and spinach, mix around, and then serve. If your diet allows it, enjoy with a piece of whole grain toast for a complete and nutritious meal! (source: bodybuilding.com)
